Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by stating that Jay-Z punched a 12-year-old girl, when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or details to support the allegation that Jay-Z punched a girl.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video captures Jay-Z punching a girl, without providing any context or verifying the authenticity of the video.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict suggests that the altercation shown in the video was actually a friendly encounter between Jay-Z and an old friend/employee, contradicting the claim's assertion of violence.
